title: Rainbow Bear's Color Walk
story_setup: Rainbow Bear loves colors and wants to visit his friend Blue Butterfly. Can you help Rainbow Bear walk through the colorful garden?
instruction: Help Rainbow Bear find the path to Blue Butterfly.
tts_instruction: Let's help Rainbow Bear walk through the garden to find his friend Blue Butterfly. Use your finger to trace the path.

character_start.description: A soft, cuddly bear with rainbow stripes on his tummy

character_end.description: A gentle butterfly with bright blue wings and a sweet smile

educational_question: What colors do you see in the garden? Can you name your favorite color?
fun_fact: Butterflies can see many more colors than people can!
completion_message: Rainbow Bear found his friend and they can play together in the colorful garden!
